title: Fantasy Esports is Recruiting
body:
Fantasy Esports is looking for an ADC starter and versatile subs. This team is a serious team and will have scheduled training, tournaments and Ranked 5v5 games. We are looking for players who are high plat and up. 

Our current roster is 

Top - Bestthreshasia ( Diamond 5 ) 
Jungle - Aeri ( Diamond 3 )
Mid -  n.a 
ADC - Edward elric
Support - Mr Fundamental ( Diamond 5 ) 

Substitutes are 

Stay bronze ( Diamond 4 ) 

If you are interested in joining Fantasy Esports please Answer these questions and i will add you accordingly to discuss details with you in game, or add me and we can sort it all out there thanks


1.   IGN ?
2.   Role
3.  Top 3 picks
4,   Availability
5.   Sub or Starter


You need Jesus - manager of Fantasy Esports

replies.body:
IGN: Vaniila magik
Role: can play all but top/willing to commit to one
availability: depending on uni but should be free most days
Sub or Starter: like to start as sub and see if i fit in with the team
currently P4

IGN: Edward ELRlC (l = small letter L)
Role: AD
Top 3 picks: Graves Vayne Jinx
Availability: depends on uni and work, usually free at night after 7pm
Sub or Starter: Starter

i used to be playing in NA (s4 diamond 4). this account (OCE) is currently d5. cheers

IGN: auRa Snakeboy1

Role: Sup

Top 3 Picks: Sion Leona Nami

anytime after 6 on weekdays and all day weekends

Starter

IGN: A Apple

Role : ADC

Top 3 Picks : 1. Graves 2. Lucian 3. Caitlyn

Availability Monday 3pm-11pm, Tuesday 6pm-11pm Wednesday 5pm-11pm Thursday 10am-2pm Friday Usually free all day Saturday, can vary depending on my work shift free rest of day though, Sunday free all day also

Sub or starter : starter

Currently platinum 2 highest I've got is platinum 1
You are on the wrong server :P

IGN: Safeu
Role: ADC
Top 3 picks: Graves, Lucian, Cait.. I can play much more.
Availability: 6-10PM, Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, Friday.
                   
Sub or Starter: Starter.
